description:
The one toque you will take snowshoeing in the morning and cross-country skiing in the evening. Made from OR’s soft Melody fabric, this beanie is happiest when you are pushing yourself in the cold.

  • Stretchy polyester blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Thermo-Regulating ActiveTemp™ treatment improves the materials breathability and wicking properties depending on your body temperature, it is some pretty cool science
  • Ponytail hole gives you hairstyle options
  • Tulip edging detail at the hem
name: Outdoor Research Melody Beanie - Women's
